viewData.name: Phi Areola Red 10ml
viewData.short_description: Phi Areola Pigments are special pigment formula intended to create a realistic-looking image of a three-dimensional nipple and areola. Special feature of these pigments is the capability to achieve a visual translation of light and shadow, which creates the illusion of three-dimensionality for a super realistic look.
viewData.long_description: Designed with a unique solution for easier skin penetration, the pigment particles are formulated in a way to be less susceptible to pigment particle migration, so color heals extremely natural and doesn't change with time compared to the shade after healing.
